description: The Columbine (Aquilegia chrysantha 'Yellow Queen') is an incredibly beautiful and eye-catching flower. The showy yellow and white flowers have an astounding, sculptural shape that grabs your attention and captivates any passerby. Its roots thrive in almost any type of soil, making it an ideal choice for gardens across the United States. Plus, its perennial nature ensures that as long as you keep it properly watered and pruned, you'll be able to enjoy its majestic blooms for years to come. Take advantage of its natural ability to attract hummingbirds and butterflies to any outdoor setup with the stunning yellow blooms of the Columbine.
